thumb.title: Il Pacioccone
thumb.description: Il Pacioccone: The Ultimate Italian Restaurant in Amsterdam CentrumWhen searching for an authentic Italian Restaurant Amsterdam Centrum, there's nothing more rewarding than finding a gem that perfectly captures the heart and soul of traditional Italy. Il Pacioccone, nestled in the vibrant Koggestraat area, is precisely that—a genuine piece of Italy located conveniently in Amsterdam's bustling center.Established in 2013, Il Pacioccone has rapidly become a local favorite and an essential destination for both locals and tourists craving authentic Italian cuisine. Renowned for its commitment to tradition and authenticity, this charming trattoria invites you into a warm, welcoming atmosphere reminiscent of a rustic Italian home, making your dining experience truly unforgettable.Il PaciocconeKoggestraat 1A, 1012TA, Amsterdam+31 6 85287440https://www.theredwinedistrict.com/il-pacioccone/
